improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero error.  The variable x will be 0 after the loop completes, resulting in a division by zero error on line 8. Add a check to ensure x is not 0 before performing the division.
Unreachable code. The loop always executes, and there are no other code paths, making any code after it unreachable.

Redundant assignment. Variable y is assigned 0 at the beginning, then reassigned in the loop. This might be unintentional; only assign values that change during the loop, otherwise assign once before the loop, to enhance readability and performance.
